function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Potential transmission of contagious diseases during semi-structured interviews in hospital settings","Risk of data contamination due to potential exposure to infectious agents","Potential impact on public health due to unmitigated disease transmission in hospital settings","Inadequate hospital preparation for the coronavirus pandemic","Psychological problems among nursing staff","Fear of infection leading to panic emotions, anxiety, and depression","Insufficient nursing knowledge about the coronavirus","Nurses working long hours in isolation facilities","Lack of trained rapid-response team to deal with suspected cases","Inadequate infection control measures for medical staff and patients","Inadequate isolation facilities and organizational support in hospitals","Multiple zones in the hospital may lead to cross-contamination if not managed effectively.","Inadequate communication and collaboration among healthcare professionals","Lack of adequate training and education for healthcare teams on dealing with covid-19","Shortage of nursing staff due to fear of infection and lack of clear plan for dealing with covid-19 pandemic","Decrease in work productivity due to covid-19 pandemic","Undermined workplace collaboration and community interactions","Challenges in workplace management during and after the covid-19 pandemic","Inadequate office workplace modification practices","Inadequate workplace health and safety monitoring","Uneven compliance with community measures","Potential for covid-19 infection cases in the office workplace","Lack of research on office workplace pandemic control","Lack of risk identification and assessment for covid-19 in the workplace","Absence of workplace guidelines for coping with covid-19 community measures","Reduced degree of openness in the office workplace","Work from home becoming the norm","Lack of clear restructuring based on headcounts analysis may lead to ineffective implementation of distancing and personal protection measures.","Reliance on virtual office space without proper management and safety measures"]}
